Your password has been successfully reset. Click below to log in to your account.

nodeDescription.value: You have successfully created a new password. Login with your new password in the future.
There was an error setting your password, please try again.

customHTML.value:
<button
  type="submit"
  id="btnSubmit"
  data-id="button"
  data-skcomponent="skbutton"
  data-skbuttontype="form-submit"
  data-skbuttonvalue="SUBMIT">
  Submit
</button>

<button
    type="submit"
    id="submit"
    data-id="button"
    data-skcomponent="skbutton"
    data-skbuttontype="next-event"
    data-skbuttonvalue="submit">
    Request Password Reset Link
</button>

nodeDescription.value: If the account exists, we will send you an email or text message with a link to reset your password.

This reset link is invalid. For your protection, the link expires after 1 hour and is for one use only. But donât worry, you can request a new reset link now. Please try again.
